## Description {#details}

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h/#l01943">1943</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h">JITLink.h</a>.

### getMarkLivePass() {#af13584b1dc0cca51793183fa537c99ec}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LinkGraphPassFunction llvm::jitlink::JITLinkContext::getMarkLivePass (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a> &amp; TT) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns the mark-live pass to be used for this link.

If no pass is returned (the default) then the target-specific linker implementation will choose a conservative default (usually marking all symbols live). This function is only called if shouldAddDefaultTargetPasses returns true, otherwise the JITContext is responsible for adding a mark-live pass in modifyPassConfig.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h/#l01986">1986</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h">JITLink.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-cpp/#l00401">401</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-cpp">JITLink.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lookup() {#a703b91afadf06911dfe35492bd290533}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::jitlink::JITLinkContext::lookup (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="#a58d8c813630c45ed687b828d320c3642">LookupMap</a> &amp; Symbols, std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/jitlinkasynclookupcontinuation">JITLinkAsyncLookupContinuation</a> &gt; LC)</>}>
Called by JITLink to resolve external symbols.

This method is passed a lookup continutation which it must call with a result to continue the linking process.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h/#l01955">1955</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h">JITLink.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### modifyPassConfig() {#a311bd3a401f79170b604b35e9b7b1613}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::jitlink::JITLinkContext::modifyPassConfig (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/jitlink/passconfiguration">PassConfiguration</a> &amp; Config)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Called by JITLink to modify the pass pipeline prior to linking.

The default version performs no modification.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h/#l01990">1990</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h">JITLink.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-cpp/#l00405">405</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-cpp">JITLink.cpp</a>.

  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::jitlink::JITLinkContext::notifyFailed (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> Err)</>}>
Notify this context that linking failed.

Called by JITLink if linking cannot be completed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h/#l01950">1950</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h">JITLink.h</a>.

### notifyFinalized() {#a05439ba03a03714938a2933b7e1e4f4e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::jitlink::JITLinkContext::notifyFinalized (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/jitlinkmemorymanager/finalizedalloc">JITLinkMemoryManager::FinalizedAlloc</a> Alloc)</>}>
Called by JITLink to notify the context that the object has been finalized (i.e.

emitted to memory and memory permissions set). If all of this objects dependencies have also been finalized then the code is ready to run.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h/#l01972">1972</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h">JITLink.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### notifyResolved() {#a82007a5d103f02d7e19f1399819da3cb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Error llvm::jitlink::JITLinkContext::notifyResolved (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp; G)</>}>
Called by JITLink once all defined symbols in the graph have been assigned their final memory locations in the target process.

At this point the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> can be inspected to build a symbol table, however the block content will not generally have been copied to the target location yet.

If the client detects an error in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> state (e.g. unexpected or missing symbols) they may return an error here. The error will be propagated to notifyFailed and the linker will bail out.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h/#l01966">1966</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h">JITLink.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### shouldAddDefaultTargetPasses() {#ac8804cf05047727379e11aedb8616773}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::jitlink::JITLinkContext::shouldAddDefaultTargetPasses (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a> &amp; TT) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Called by JITLink prior to linking to determine whether default passes for the target should be added.

The default implementation returns true. If subclasses override this method to return false for any target then they are required to fully configure the pass pipeline for that target.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h/#l01978">1978</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-h">JITLink.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-cpp/#l00397">397</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/jitlink/jitlink-cpp">JITLink.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
